text_block_list.text:
The middle of summer. 
While all the Uma Musume were enjoying their Summer Training camp——

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, is that Orfevre-san's trainer?

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Ah, they're looking this way! Thanks for your hard work♪

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, they're embarrassed!

Lately, I've felt that more and more 
Uma Musume have been talking to me.

It seems like they've seen me being pushed around by Orfevre and 
her unreasonable demands often, and now they're curious about me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Your role——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Was it to curry favor with commoners?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Dullard.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……a long-distance swim. 
Prepare some tea for me over there.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text:
That trainer is really interesting aren't they～? 
When I talked to them, they seemed like the shy type.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——How insolent.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: O-Orfevre……-san?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Everything under the sun is my possession.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
For a commoner to attempt to take the King's 
possessions……is the height of arrogance.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text:
No……eh? 
P-possession……?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……I will not say it again.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: It is forbidden to lay hands on the King's property……!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume D
text_block_list.text: Hiiiii!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……to all you insolent fools.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Whether it lives or dies……and whether you can 
associate with it. The one that decides that——will be me.
Summer training camp, a day off.

It was a short rest day, so the other Uma Musume 
were already out enjoying their day off. I was going 
to take it easy and work on some paperwork but——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——You.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I will be heading out. 
You will accompany me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: A foolish question.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: A place to entertain me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——Offer up all of the prizes lined up here.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
If you can't, then starting from tomorrow, 
you'll also be doing the running training.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong? 
They seem to be messing with you.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……Hmmm.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——Gather.

text_block_list.name: Goldfish Scoop Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah!? 
Wh-what's going on～!?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Everything under the sun is my servant.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Maybe you should learn to follow their example.

Just the pressure alone was enough to make the goldfish obey…… 
It was almost as if she stood above all beings.

After that, we went around to each of the food stalls, 
and eventually it was time for the fireworks display.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
This place is not bad. 
You have my praise.
choice_data_list: I heard about it from a senpai

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: So the result of information gathering, is it?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: However——this is just a fabricated luminance.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Next year——you should be involved in the planning. 
For fireworks that will entertain me.
choice_data_list: Would they even listen to a trainer……?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Fool. 
With my achievements, nothing will be impossible.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
However——if you cannot satisfy me, know that I 
will launch you, along with those fireworks.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Heh. 
Then do your utmost to make sure that doesn't happen.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Obey 『Me』, and work for 『My』 sake. 
And then——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Live to entertain only 『Me』

I felt like I'd just been given an incredibly 
difficult order……but I am resolved. I'll 
work hard to keep this promise with Orfevre……
